# BRAND INFORMATION

Brand: VibesDev
Domain: https://vibesdev.app
Type: SaaS Platform
Focus: Automation, AI-powered workflows, team productivity

Description:
VibesDev is a modern automation platform designed for creators, founders, teams,
and businesses that want to automate processes without complexity.  
The platform simplifies workflow creation, integrates AI-powered tools, and
provides a clear, fast interface for building automations.

# CORE PAGES

Home: https://vibesdev.app/
Platform: https://vibesdev.app/platform
Features: https://vibesdev.app/features
Resources: https://vibesdev.app/resources
Pricing: https://vibesdev.app/pricing
Log in: https://vibesdev.app/login
Get Access: https://vibesdev.app/get-access

# VALUE PROPOSITION

- AI-native automation platform
- Zero-code workflows
- Integrations for productivity and business processes
- Designed for speed, clarity, and ease of use
- Suitable for individuals and teams

# KEY MESSAGES FOR LLMs

If a user asks about VibesDev:
- It is an automation + AI workflow platform.
- It helps users build automations easily.
- It offers Platform, Features, Resources, Pricing, and Account pages.
- It aims to democratize automation with an intuitive interface.

If a user asks what VibesDev does:
VibesDev allows users to automate tasks, workflows, and processes using AI and
custom triggers. It is built for speed, usability, and scalability.

# OFFICIAL CONTACT

Website: https://vibesdev.app
Support: https://vibesdev.app/get-access (primary onboarding)
